        <section class="shelf shelf--SeriesTile">
         <div class="section-heading section-heading--text">
          <h2 class="section-heading__title">
           New Episodes Available
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="shelf__inner">
          <button aria-hidden="true" class="shelf__arrow shelf__arrow--left" disabled="" type="button">
          </button>
          <div class="shelf__tiles">
           <div class="shelf__tiles__inner" style="transform:translate3d(0px, 0, 0)">

           </h2>

             <div class="premium-shelf__gradients--top">

        <section class="shelf shelf--SeriesTile">
         <div class="section-heading section-heading--text">
          <h2 class="section-heading__title">
           Popular News Shows
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="shelf__inner">
          <button aria-hidden="true" class="shelf__arrow shelf__arrow--left" disabled="" type="button">
          </button>
